lead_paragraph: R.C. Buford is the last person to take a victory lap, especially when the San Antonio Spurs are in the middle of a second-round playoff fight with the Oklahoma City Thunder.

headline.print_headline: San Antonio's RC Buford Named NBA Executive of the Year
headline.main: San Antonio's RC Buford Named NBA Executive of the Year
